title: Königlich Bayerisches Amtsgericht
resume:
Königlich Bayerisches Amtsgericht is a German comedy television series. It was produced by ZDF in the years 1968 to 1972 and contains 52 episodes.
It is set in the German Empire shortly before World War I and revolves around the court proceedings of the Königlich Bayrisches Amtsgericht in the fictional Bavarian small town Geisbach. Almost all actors speak with a Bavarian dialect.
The series features many famous Bavarian actors like Gustl Bayrhammer, Hans Baur and Max Grieser.
